attributes.action: have period products and sanitary items to be free
attributes.additional_details: because we didn’t ask to be women and it is unfair that we have to spend around £15 a months just because we are women
attributes.background: have more funding or cheaper prices for them as not everyone can afford it or to make them free and have them sent to houses

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for the price of sanitary products, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund Free Period Products - it is not a LUXURY: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599377

Require sanitary products are made available in all public and workplace toilets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606807

Reduce the VAT on reusable menstrual products "Period Pants" from 20% to 0%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614222
